name: Darkspore
description:
Darkspore is an action-RPG game developed by Maxis. It came out on 26-04-2011. Electronic Arts published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Darkspore has a score of 65. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Darkspore on PC.
Thomas Vu produced the game. It was directed by Thomas Vu. Junkie XL scored the game.
